input: Retrieve the total number of loan contracts that have been changed in terms of borrower party and their completion date.

output.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequest AS T1 JOIN LoanContract AS T2 ON T1.LoanContractUUID = T2.UUID WHERE T1.LifeCycleStatusCode = '3' AND T1.CompletionDate > CURRENT_DATE;
